quote.text: To be reborn, we must first die to what we no longer are. In this conscious death we find the door to our true life.
quote.author: Kundalini Transformation Teachings

overview.title: What is Rebirthing in Kundalini Yoga?
overview.subtitle: A sacred process of symbolic death and rebirth that releases limiting patterns
overview.description: Rebirthing in Kundalini Yoga is a transformative ceremony that symbolizes the death of the limited ego and the birth of a new expanded consciousness. Through specific breathing techniques, mantras, meditation and movement, participants experience a profound release of energetic and emotional patterns that no longer serve them.

card1.title: Emotional Release
card1.text: Release traumas, fears and emotional blocks stored in the body and psyche, allowing a free flow of vital energy.

card2.title: Transformation of Being
card2.text: Experience a deep metamorphosis, leaving behind old limiting identities to emerge as your most authentic self.

card3.title: Spiritual Connection
card3.text: Reconnect with your divine essence and experience expanded states of consciousness and universal unity.

card4.title: Ancestral Healing
card4.text: Heal inherited and karmic patterns, releasing ancestral lines and creating a new energetic legacy.

process.title: The Rebirthing Process
process.subtitle: A sacred journey of symbolic death and spiritual resurrection

step1.title: Sacred Preparation
step1.text: We create a sacred space with meditation, invocations and establishment of clear intentions for transformation.

step2.title: Transformative Breathing
step2.text: We use specific pranayama techniques that activate kundalini energy and facilitate deep emotional release.

step3.title: Liberation Mantras
step3.text: We chant powerful mantras that dissolve limiting patterns and create new frequencies of healing and renewal.

step4.title: Transformative Fire
step4.text: We participate in the symbolic process of burning the old - fears, limitations and patterns that keep us small.

step5.title: Rebirth and Integration
step5.text: We emerge as renewed beings, integrating the new identity and receiving blessings for the path ahead.

participation.title: Who is Rebirthing For?
participation.subtitle: This transformative experience is open to all brave souls

card1.title: People in Transition
card1.text: If you are going through important changes in your life - separations, career changes, losses - rebirthing helps you navigate these transitions with grace.

card2.title: Trauma Healers
card2.text: For those who wish to heal deep traumas, limiting family patterns or emotional wounds that affect their well-being.

card3.title: Purpose Seekers
card3.text: If you feel your life needs a new direction or you want to connect with your deepest and most authentic purpose.

card4.title: Spiritual Explorers
card4.text: People committed to their spiritual growth seeking profound experiences of transformation and expansion of consciousness.
